H0.text: What is the name of the island formed by volcanic action off the south coast of Iceland in 1963. Vestmannaeyjar

H1.text: What is the name of the island formed by volcanic action off the south coast of Iceland in 1963. Heimaey

H2.text: What is the name of the island formed by volcanic action off the south coast of Iceland in 1963. Geirfuglasker

H3.text: What is the name of the island formed by volcanic action off the south coast of Iceland in 1963. Surtsey

A4.text: Surtsey is an uninhabited volcanic island located in the Vestmannaeyjar archipelago off the southern coast of Iceland.

A5.text: The new island was named after Surtr, a fire j√∂tunn or giant from Norse mythology.
